General.Name: Ulusoy Un Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Ulusoy Un Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells wheat flour in Turkey. The company offers chapati, noodle, bread and bagetet rack, hamburger, toast, crown, dumplings, pizza, tortilla, filler, biscuit, wafer, cake, cracker, cookie, simit, play dough, mantilik, milfife, trako makine, rye, esmer village bread, coating, yellow wheat, breadcrumbs, noodle, and soft noodle flour products; and products for high gluten aqua feed and aqua feed, as well as home use products. It also manufactures, wholesales, retail purchases, sales, and imports and exports of foodstuffs; trading of grains; and warehousing activities for the storage of agricultural products. The company exports its wheat flour to 92 countries in 5 continents from Far East to the Caribbean Islands covering Africa and the Middle East countries. Ulusoy Un Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Samsun, Turkey.
